name: alyssum

a short plant with small, often yellow or white, flowers: They decided to plant three different varieties of alyssum at the front of the flowerbeds. Alyssums are a great choice for a rock garden, alongside the usual alpines. The purple petunias and white alyssum were still blooming next to the strip of green lawn.
